last_episode_to_air.name: Illumination Night
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's a sacred day in the Electric City. Celebratory beacons will light up the night sky. Amidst the festivities, Cleveland Carr meets with Mrs. Orwell to report the latest on the illicit activities plaguing the city. Mrs. Orwell's plan of retaliation comes as a surprise to Carr. The Wave Unit Revolution commences - a warning in the North Sky ensures the city will never be the same.

name: Electric City
overview: Electric City is an award-winning, animated, post-apocalyptic, science fiction, web series published through Yahoo!. Created by Tom Hanks, the series begins after the world has ended. Electric City represents peace and security in the midst of rubble. Even though it seems to be an orderly utopia, there are still secrets, back-alley dealings, daring chases and murder.

episodes.name: Truth or Consequences
episodes.overview: Cleveland Carr, a secret operative, introduces us to the wonders and dangers of the Electric City. Mrs. Orwell knits in a circle of mysterious elderly women, however this is no ordinary knitting club. They discuss a plan to patch a particular hole in the justice system. Cleveland Carr pays a visit to one of the City's most unsavory characters.

episodes.name: The Voice of the City
episodes.overview: Cleveland Carr meets Hope Chatsworth, the voice of Wire 6, the city's communication service. The young, ever-curious Roger Moore investigates the scofflaws who engage in the contraband communication known as Tap Code.

episodes.name: Survivors
episodes.overview: Mrs. Orwell visits the History Museum but her trip down memory lane triggers flashbacks to a more volatile time. Cleveland Carr pays a visit to Knobs, and decides this lovable little lawbreaker is going to make a great stool-pigeon. Dick and Eva Jacobs tap for kicks with their neighbor, Walter La Fong. Hope sends a message to Carr via the wire service broadcast.

episodes.name: Young Daughter or God
episodes.overview: Commander Welles of the Allied Municipal Patrol is briefed on the city-wide spread of the Tap Kits. The women in the knitting guild know all too well the danger of unregulated influence. The darkness of Mrs. Orwell's past continues to come into focus. Dr. Loman and Makaela enter the city with big plans. Hope suspects her coworker, Frank Deetleman, is up to something.

episodes.name: We're Social Animals
episodes.overview: Mrs. Orwell asks Carr to get a sense of scale in the Tap Kit epidemic. A deeper look into Mrs. Orwell's past begins to make her current motivations clearer. Mrs. Emerson lets her operative, Dick Jacobs, know she is not pleased about the Tap Code problem.

episodes.name: All in Service to All
episodes.overview: Dr. Loman is more than a just spectator to city government. Knobs is asked to build new technology. Hope follows Deetleman to find out what he's been up to.

episodes.name: What Aren't We Capable Of?
episodes.overview: Knobs tells Carr about a new technology: a Wave Unit Kit. Dr. Loman meets with Mr. Orwell. Mrs. Orwell was once on the outside of the Electric City looking in.

episodes.name: The Time Has Come
episodes.overview: Carr meets the Wave Unit Kits face to face. Eva Jacobs has a surprise for her husband Dick. It causes him to ask Mrs. Emerson a very tough question.

episodes.name: The Saddest of Reasons
episodes.overview: The Knitting Society has become fully aware of the Wave Units but it is a possible breach from within their organization that has them on high alert. Carr is becoming intimately acquainted with Hope but Mrs. Orwell has far more dangerous ways for him to spend his time.

episodes.name: Never the Two Shall Meet
episodes.overview: It is a dark day in the Electric City. Mrs. Orwell orders a reduction job. Deetleman takes Hope behind the curtain and explains to her what Wave Units are going to mean to the City. Dick Jacobs runs into Carr in a dark alley.

episodes.name: Necessary to Hide
episodes.overview: Commander Welles is the barer of bad news when he pays Eva Jacobs a visit. Deetleman shows Hope how to use a Wave Unit Kit. Roger Moore discovers the impending 'revolution' on his own.

episodes.name: Lost Souls
episodes.overview: Commander Welles and Mrs. Emerson scramble to figure out if Dick had left any thing behind that might be troublesome. Simultaneously, Eva and La Fong search Dick's possessions for clues. The mysterious Dr. Loman surveys the city ahead of his plot.

episodes.name: Lorenzo Seventeen
episodes.overview: Hope has quickly taken to her new hobby, the Wave Unit Kit. A very injured Cleveland Carr pays her a visit for some tender loving care. Mr. and Mrs. Orwell get romantic. Carr gets romantic too, but he's dreaming of his younger days.

episodes.name: Trail of Dead Bodies
episodes.overview: Cleveland Carr is haunted by his origins. Knobs is busy peddling Wave Units. La Fong and Eva find some disturbing information on a recording Dick left behind. Dr. Loman heads back to the

episodes.name: Strategic Casualties
episodes.overview: Roger Moore and his young friend Gladys do their best to warn the authorities about the Wave Unit Revolution. Meanwhile, the knitting club decide how they will deal with influx of Wave Units. Carr sends a message to the purveyors of the Units.

episodes.name: No One Is Untraceable
episodes.overview: Eva is determined to explore the Out Side for clues; Walter La Fong helps her with the journey. Cleveland Carr visits a Wave Unit Assembly line. Commander Welles explains the aftermath of a tragic

episodes.name: People Like a Good Show
episodes.overview: Makaela warns her crews producing Wave Units to be vigilant. Hope finds the underground movement has moved on without her. La Fong's journalistic instincts lead him down a dark path. Eva reaches the Out Side, but not with out complications.

episodes.name: The Outside
episodes.overview: Carr and Hope are falling deeper in love, while Deetleman and Makaela are busy planning the Illumination Night Wave Unit Revolution. Eva is the newest member of Mars and its inhabitants want to know all about her. La Fong finds a Wave Unit dealer... Knobs!

episodes.name: Such Beauty From a Box
episodes.overview: Residents on both sides of the law are preparing for the Illumination Night broadcast. Deetleman begs Hope to stop her involvement with Wave Units. Eva explains what brought her to the Out Side.

episodes.name: Illumination Night
episodes.overview: It's a sacred day in the Electric City. Celebratory beacons will light up the night sky. Amidst the festivities, Cleveland Carr meets with Mrs. Orwell to report the latest on the illicit activities plaguing the city. Mrs. Orwell's plan of retaliation comes as a surprise to Carr. The Wave Unit Revolution commences - a warning in the North Sky ensures the city will never be the same.
